tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CrimeData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR,
    location VARCHAR,
    date_time TIMESTAMP,
    incident_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crime_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crime_type VARCHAR(255),
    crime_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    suspect_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE crime_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    crime_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE law_enforcement_agencies (
    agency_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    jurisdiction VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    officer_count INT,
    contact_info VARCHAR(150)
);

CREATE TABLE criminal_records (
   record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   criminal_name VARCHAR(50),
   criminal_age INT,
   criminal_gender CHAR(1),
   crime_id INT,
   FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES crime_data(crime_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crime_analysis (
   analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   crime_id INT,
   agency_id INT,
   analysis_type VARCHAR(50),
   analysis_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (crime_id) REFERENCES crime_data(crime_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES law_enforcement(agency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Crimes (
  crime_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  crime_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  crime_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  crime_date TIMESTAMP,
  perpetrator_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Perpetrators (
  perpetrator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  perpetrator_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  perpetrator_age INT,
  perpetrator_gender VARCHAR(10),
  perpetrator_address VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE Victims (
  victim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  victim_age INT,
  victim_gender VARCHAR(10),
  victim_address VARCHAR(200),
  crime_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE CrimeReports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date TIMESTAMP,
  crime_id UUID,
  perpetrator_id UUID,
  officer_id UUID
);
